overview: Eoin Dowling is the co-founder and Chief Executive Officer of Boxfish. As the CEO, Eoin is applying his previous entrepreneurial experience toward both product and business development with the ambition to revolutionize the discovery of television content. Prior to Boxfish, Eoin studied Media Technology before co-founding Red Circle, a platform for consumers to acquire mobile content. Eoin grew the business to revenues of $50m before it was aqcuired in 2008. The company became the largest off portal mobile content distribution company in the UK and Ireland. Eoin has big plans around the disruption and evolution of TV discovery and works with an amazing team building the index of television.
